long_description: Topographic maps for the entire state in book form, with unequaled backroad detail--includes detailed street maps of Boston, Springfield and Worcester. Softcover; 80 pages; includes 54 quadrangular state maps and 6 pages of city maps along with street name indexes. Map scale: 1:80,000; 1 inch equals 1.3 miles; countour interval: 80'. Delorme Publishing; copyright1998. Includes shaded relief maps. Ideal for outdoor recreation, reference, business, engineering and emergency services; GPS compatible.
short_description: Topographic maps for the entire state in book form, with unequaled backroad detail--includes detailed street maps of Boston, Springfield and Worcester.
